SMALL BIZ HURT. Higher payroll taxes, less $$ to hire workers, raise wages, grow their business or contribute to local economy.  Or save for retirement.
GRANDKIDS GET MUGGED.  Under HR2100 low earning grandchild pays $53,000 in higher payroll taxes over career so grandma gets extra $32 a month. That fair?
SINGLE MOMS PUNISHED.  Single mom w/two kids pays no taxes on first $53k under GOP tax cuts. Under Democrat HR2100 her taxes go up $1344 every year. How does that help her?
WORKING FAMILIES HAMMERED. Under HR2100 families w/both spouses working = $2,100 a year payroll tax increase. Smaller paychecks for life.
MILLENNIALS GET RIPPED OFF. Higher payroll taxes reduce paychecks for young workers by over $50,0OO. Cuts lifetime income by more than 2% over career.  Less for savings, quality of life.
